tool_description: Retrieves current status and timeline information for existing return requests, including processing stages and estimated completion dates.

return_id.description: Return request ID or authorization number

include_history.description: Whether to include full status change history

error_messages: Return not found: The provided return ID does not exist in the system.
Access denied: Return information is not accessible with current permissions.
System error: Return tracking system is temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide return_id to get current status and tracking information. Set include_history to false for quicker responses when full timeline is not needed.

current_status.description: Current processing status of the return

last_updated.description: Date and time of last status update

estimated_completion.description: Expected completion date for return processing

tracking_events.description: Chronological list of status changes and events

next_action_required.description: Next step required to progress the return
